input:
## Buggy Code:
```rust
#[allow(clippy::uninlined_format_args)] fn greet(name: &str) { println!("Hello, {}", name); }
```

## Compiler Error:
clippy::uninlined_format_args: use inline format args instead of suppressing

## Fixed Code:
